Without wasting time and with a devilish smile decorating her face, the Dancer would use her right hand to deploy a piercing attack to the orc, hitting him pretty well~
Vanilor BOT 28-Jul-20 11:09 PM
Vanilor had been trying to flee and knew the Orc was close on his rear, Hed managed to cross enough to distance to place his back against a tree and prepare for the attack: and he did just that. He watched Bofwant try to slow the large enraged beast down, but to no prevail. When the Orc found himself in front of Vanilor and swung its massive weapon towards him he ducked to the side, and stepped far enough away to create some distance from the Orc. It was then that Juma swept in and served the Orc a near fatal blow, leaving it critically wounded and sprawled out on the ground, bleeding and awaiting its fate. Vanilor watched the defeated Orc as it gurgled and choked on its blood, though it reached for its weapon out of desperation and was about to rise to his feet. BANG! A sheet of fire expelled itself from the barrel of Vanilors revolver and engulfed both the Orc and the tree, even Juma could feel the immense heat of the fire though she managed to remain unscathed. “Magic would’ve helped you—...” Vanilor grunted under his breathe, responding to a comment the Orc made some time ago. He watched the Orc burn until the smell of flesh stung at his nostrils, then he turned to face Juma with a pain stricken smile, javelin still sticking through his left shoulder. “It was good to fight with you Juma, I don’t believe I ever shared my name. I am Vanilor.” He said in a light voice, weakened by his wounds; then offered a brief bow.
Dungeon Master BOT 28-Jul-20 11:23 PM
A few seconds passed after the final enemy was burn to death before the whole scenario started bro change again. Like an illusion slowly dropping, the forest gave away to the sight of the training hall. Standing there with his arms crossed over his metallic chest was the battle master, #iron-tower-battlemaster After the ending of the simulation, the group of guild members found themselves a few feet from eachother like of they had been pulled together towards the middle of the big room without even noticing. "Sloppy start. Like chickens running scared.... But then it was decent teamwork." The rough metallic voice of Mr. Tower greeted them. "Good work for being the first time. I expect to see some improvement later." And with that the battle master started to walk away towards the small office that was located on the side of the room. The arrows and other weapons sticking out of them had dissapeared, leaving open yet not bleeding wounds on them. Painful but not as serious as they could be have been. A bath, a bandages and a good rest would be enough to leave them as new.
Selaphiel Rookwood BOT 28-Jul-20 11:42 PM
As the simulation faded, Sela immediately ran to Bofwant, her sole focus on him and any injury he sustained. She recalled the last time they’d trained and how badly he’d ached afterwards. Though she also recalled what happened between them after that battle as well. Just then, her cheeks felt hot, that warmth moving down along her lithe body. “My love...!” Sela shouted. “Are you all right?” Her hands tested him, checking for injury, though a part of her now feared the unwanted arrival of Jarreth. The red head could almost see that hissing scowl and those strange otherworldly eyes. Trying to push the fiend out of her mind, Sela then turned towards the others. “Is everyone else all right?” she asked them. “I should’ve been better about helping you all, and not let trees or anything else distract me. Though you all did wonderfully.”
Vanilor BOT 29-Jul-20 09:58 AM
The forested scene that once overwhelmed their senses began flickering and eventually faded out to reveal they were exactly where they had always been. The pain that was once in Vanilors left shoulder had subsided greatly, though he couldn’t resist reaching up to feel the newly formed bruise. Now that they were back in the true training hall a sense of calm washed over Vanilor, likely assisted by the sight of Bofwant and Selaphiel sharing affection. Then when the man known as Mr. Iron Tower spoke Vanilor turned his full attention to him, listening to each of his words with great intent. When he acknowledged their performance Vanilor simply dropped his head in a slight bow, which he held until the man had disappeared into his office. Then, turning to his companions once more he smiled. “Just a few bumps and scratches—..” he said followed by a faint chuckle. “Thank you Bofwant and Selaphiel, without you two I would not have made it through.” and then he looked to Juma, smiling wider. “And you— Your fighting style is most beautiful; like a form of art.”
Juma/Melmie/Kalosha 29-Jul-20 10:34 AM
The lips of Juma released a last sigh before the simulation ended, letting her eyes explore the training hall once more. To be honest... she prefered the forest, but without those orcs. Relaxed and surprised by the reduction of pain that she was feeling. Well... that was pretty good. The ears of the Half elf heard the words of the Tower without taking some attention from him. It was her first time here, so... any warning or tip was pretty useful! If... there was one. Better that than nothing. Finally, as Juma heard the words of Sela, Juma would nod at her as she showed her usual confident and wide smile. Obviously, she was injuried, but it would be pretty easy to heal... Her lips would release a little laugh as she heard the words of Vanilor, just fueling the confidence that her face was showing at this moments~ ''Well, I'm a dancer after all. Of course my fighting style is like a form of art... geez~ But I think Sela did it better than me in this case, hehe.'' She replied with a friendly tone of voice at the same time that she placed her gaze on Sela~
Bofwant BOT 29-Jul-20 03:08 PM
Bofwant lowered his shield and started to take deep breaths as soon as he saw the room starting to change back, thankful that the training exercise had been completed. As always he smiled at Mr. Tower's words since he knew that they had done very well for him to scolded them so little. When Sela started to fuss over him he just chuckled a little. "I am fine my love... That fight was exactly what I needed!" For once the quiet healer was showing some bubbly happiness, that's how good he felt! He sheated his sword before he shook his head, a smile still on his face. "You were wonderful Sela. You healed when I couldn't and attacked our enemy when it was the best moment to do so... Look at you! Not even a scratch!" He told her happily and leaned forward to give her a small peck on the lips. Finally he turned around and nodded at the other two guild members. "Mr. Vanilor, Miss Juma, I thank you both. Even if we had a rough start I really enjoyed fighting side by side with you both."
Selaphiel Rookwood BOT 29-Jul-20 07:16 PM
Sela felt her face grow hot when she started receiving compliments. “Thank you,” she said softly to both the tiefling and the dancer. Honestly, she hadn’t felt overly helpful and had worried she’d didn’t do enough. It made her decide right then and there that she’d follow Bofwant the next time he worked a shift in the med bay. For some reason, something inside beckoned she learn these skills. Hone them. Turn them into a work of art. Of course, there was a part of her—that bonded part—that seethed at the very idea. Why couldn’t Jarreth be supportive? It was an oddity the girl couldn’t quite understand. “Oh, my love...” Sela then said, after Bofwant kissed her and gave her a look that made her heart flutter. No longer did he seem like the tired medic, weary and worn. It was as if he’d suddenly been invigorated by forces both unseen and unknown. But no matter. “I did what I could, but...” she hesitated a moment. “But could I perhaps join you the next time you work a shift in med bay? There’s so much that I could learn... could... could I?” she looked up at him with the hopeful golden eyes, her pretty face pleading to let her learn.
Vanilor BOT 29-Jul-20 08:43 PM
Vanilor smiled intensely while he listened to his companions speak, bowing his head in acknowledgement when thanked by each. He was a man of few words and was content solely listening to the three of them converse, trying to learn what little he could of his companions from their brief time together. The only thing Vanilor knew for certain: Bofwant and Selaphiel were madly in love. Vanilor thought seeing such affection between Bofwant and Selaphiel would have stung at the memories he shared with his former lover, though he was surprised to find peace from each memory that came to mind. “I too would like to learn some of your wisdom, Bofwant — If you would part with it.” He finally interjected after Selaphiel had made mention of it increasing her medicinal knowledge. “Every spell-caster should have a healing spell or tool in their arsenal. I do not wish to lose another—..” his second set of words came slower and had more pain to them, but the smile on his face never faltered. It was clear he’d lost a loved one and was moments from sharing their name; but he stopped himself and let his sentence fall short.
Juma/Melmie/Kalosha 30-Jul-20 08:33 PM
''You're welcome. I have to learn some things yet, so I'll do it better next time~'' Juma said with some confidence on her words after her ears heard the words of Bofwant. It was good to hear that sometimes. She couldn't help and smiled at the words of Sela, feeling how her confidence got fueled a bit by that. Her eyes would confirm one or two things as she saw Sela and Bofwant doing a... little and quick show with their lips. It could be a small peck, buuuut that would explain more than some words. Seems like that's one of my weak points, hehe.'' The Dancer said as she placed her right hand on the back of her own head, rubbing it a bit with her fingers during her words~
Bofwant BOT 31-Jul-20 08:49 AM

Selaphiel Rookwood BOT 31-Jul-20 07:29 PM

She then stood slightly to the paladin’s side and smiled, focusing on how learning the trade of her love would make her even happier than she was in that moment... except there was that unfortunate problem by the name of Jarreth that they couldn’t ignore. Not forever.
But now was a time to celebrate. So Sela pushed her patron from her mind and nodded at Bofwant’s suggestion. “Sounds like a nice idea. I wouldn’t mind some juice. For some reason, I’m craving something fruity.” She then bit down on her lip, her expression rather sheepish. “I’m ready when everyone else is.”
Vanilor BOT 01-Aug-20 01:21 AM
“I will take whatever wisdom or tools you have to share, Bofwant.” Vanilor said in a brief but respectful bow, then took a moment to admire the unique architecture of the Training Hall once again; in its true form. “I do not indulge in intoxicants for it interferes with my studies, however I will gladly accompany you for some time. — I would like to hear more of you and your brother, Selaphiel.” He said with a faint smile, hoping she’d see his curiosity with good intentions. “I’m sure there’s much to learn from all of you.” He added while pulling a rag dampened by oil from his pocket and began wiping down his revolver. Avrae BOT 05-Aug-20 04:21 PM
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 05-Aug-20 04:40 PM
Tomara slips off his Goliath lover's shoulders, to the smooth floor of the training hall's arena. He dusts off his pants needlessly, and looks around the space. "This is very nice," he says with a toothy grin, "What have you planned for today, dear?" (edited)
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 05-Aug-20 04:48 PM
"Well, I suppose that's partially up to you. You're not particularly weak, you're plenty dexterous, there's plenty of way we can do things... I feel you'll do better focusing on capitalizing on your natural dexterity rather than trying to build up strength, if you'd like my most earnest opinion. That means rapiers, bows, shortblades... Things I'm not terribly skilled with, admittedly, but I'm decent enough to help you through the basics." He throws out ideas, trying to gauge Tomara's interest.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 05-Aug-20 04:54 PM
The tabaxi taps his foot thoughtfully and, after a moment, takes out his collapsible bo staff. It expands to full length as he tosses it to Jonny. "I have an acceptable knowledge of knives, though the bows I'm accustomed to practicing with are easier to use. What about this, though? It's a bo staff, it's served me very well since I bought it in the previous universe. But I'll admit I'm not skilled with it." (edited)
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 05-Aug-20 05:12 PM
Jonny catches the staff, twirling it laxly for a moment before leaning it on his shoulder. "Could use one of these, sure... You'd have to put your muscle into it, 'less you're planning to prance around like those monk types. You wouldn't be getting best value out of it, otherwise." He shrugs. "Bopping people on the head is a fair enough tactic, though. Worked for me in my fights, ha."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 04:28 PM
Tomara beams and takes the bo staff in his paw with a light grip. He walks further into the arena and stands with a somewhat cocky pose. His tail sways mischievously with a glint in his eye to match. "Alright then, let's see if I can get any better with this old thing, ey? Would you like to spar, dearest?"
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 04:31 PM
The goliath barks out a laugh as he follows along, well, wasn't that an interesting proposition? "You sure about that, kitten? I don't go easy, even during spars. Wouldn't want that pretty face to get all bloodied up." Despite his words, he prepares himself, standing across from the Tabaxi with a gleam in his eyes.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 04:41 PM
The kitty tosses his head and winks. His stance becomes defensive and, with his proposal accepted, the wizard quickly surrounds his lithe figure in mage armor. "I doubt I'll stop being cute, mo aboré." He smirks again. "And we both know I like it rough."
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 05:04 PM
"That so..? Well, far be it from me to deny the cute kitty his desire. But I'll be sporting about it, so... You can take the first shot." Jonny settles in, preparing himself.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 08:46 PM
"Alright then! If you insist!" Tomara's fangs gleam, and in a flash, he sprints toward the Goliath, leaping into the air and twisting to land as hard a blow as possible. His bones rattle from the impact, and there's a hard crack of light metal against bone.
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 08:57 PM
The goliath rolls with the blow as best he can, lashing out blindly with his own pole(arm) and catching nothing but air. Usually, he'd stop there for the sake of fairness, but rattled as he was, he almost instinctively followed through with another swing that nearly ran the Tabaxi through. "A-ah, whoops... Didn't mean to strike quite that fiercely... You alright, kitten?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 09:47 PM
The tabaxi yelps as they're struck by the second attack, and is thrown back painfully. He sits up slowly and blinks stars out of his eyes. "Dear gods. Certainly glad I didn't fight you at the wedding dear..." He tries to put up his ears again, but they're flattened firmly against the wizard's skull as he uses the bo staff to help himself back up. He assumes a fighting stance again, but feels something from his nose. He puts up a paw, and pulls it away with blood coating the pads. "Ugh... That's not good. I'll survive dear, but perhaps a bit of casting will even this out!" Still set a good distance from the Goliath, Tomara swipes his staff as he did at the wedding spar, sending three bolts of magical energy slamming directly into his lover's head and chest. Nobody will die. They'll stop before it goes too far- he has enough self control for that, at least.
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 09:55 PM
"Not bad. But..." He twirls the pike about in his hands, and stamps the blunt end into his lover's forehead, putting the wizard down for the count, while tacitly avoiding any sort of lethal damage. Even if it would just result in a Penalty anyway, he didn't want to subject Tomara to the trauma of being 'killed', especially by someone he'd hope the other man cared for. "You're still lacking experience." He returns the polearm to its place on his back, then gently steps forward, offering the wizard a hand up.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 10:02 PM
His nose is still bleeding a bit as Tomara takes Jonny's hand gratefully. "I didn't expect to win anyhow." He winces as his forehead begins to throb from that last blow. "I did hit you quite well though-I would certainly call that some level of victory! You- ow- you're certainly as strong as your kin are designed to be, dear."
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 10:09 PM
"Hah. That I am, but that's neither here nor there. You managed a solid strike- not only that, but it was clean as anything, enough to rattle me. I can think back to times when a strike like that would've had me nearly out on my feet." He pats the wizard on the back gently, trying to encourage him without outright knocking him over in his current, weakened state. "But let's take a moment before we go on to anything else- wouldn't want ya passin' out on me."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 11:27 PM
Tomara nods and collapses the staff. "thank you, that's a good idea." The cat leans a bit on Jonny, now without the support of his weapon, and huffs gently. There might be a little blood getting on the Goliath's clothes, but the steady flow has already slowed. He'll be fine.
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 11:32 PM
Jonny gently hugs the cat. Blood's nothing new to him, it's no big deal really. "Really need to help you get used to real armor sooner than later... A couple good shots like that, and you're good as Penalized. No one should be layin' hands on my kitten like that..."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 11:33 PM
Tomara looks up and raises a brow. "And what would that be? I dont believe the term has been explained to me, though I've heard it in passing. It doesn't seem to apply in the way I'm familiar with."
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 11:39 PM
"Right, you're new, ain'tcha..?" The goliath takes a moment to collect what knowledge he can recall offhand in his mind. A historian, he is not. "Well, the Goddess Sune- the big leader of the deities since recently, yeah? She was so sick o' seein' pointless death everywhere, she made it so anyone beaten down or killed would return to life, 'less the would-be killer went super out of their way to make it stick, and invite her wrath in doin' so. Instead, the defeated have a Penalty inflicted upon 'em; have to follow a single order from the victor, though generally it has to be a one-off thing like, 'submit to arrest', or 'go home'... Though, less morally inclined sorts can and have given crueler orders in the past, like 'don't resist while I fuck you', and fucked-up shit like that."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 06-Aug-20 11:45 PM
The tabaxi's expression turns sour and defensive, and he leans into Jonny even more. "That's disgusting. I suppose your Sune had good intentions, but there are far too many methods of exploiting Her law. I agree, I don't want to ever find myself subjected to the... 'Penalty'."
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 06-Aug-20 11:55 PM
"You an' me both... 'S half of why I trained myself up to the nth degree. All it takes is one opponent acting in bad faith, and suddenly I might be forced to do something ridiculous before a crowd... So, I have to be an unbeatable gladiator, yeah? The image of Jonny Alpha has to be the best, it wouldn't survive the scars of a bad loss. And... The person, Jonathan Armand, is utterly terrified by the very concept of having my own free will stolen from me." The goliath seems to lose some of his usual bombast, a wry expression replacing his usual confident demeanor.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 07-Aug-20 12:04 AM
Tomara nods solemnly and kisses the Goliath's hand. "I understand dear. How about we take a walk? I passed the garden a few times while I was exploring the ship- I think we could do with a little calm for a bit."
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 07-Aug-20 12:09 AM
He chuckles, and shakes his head a little at the sweet gesture. "Only you would be completely unphased to hear my real name after I've gone so long under that silly stage persona... Sure. A walk sounds excellent, Tom-cat. 'S that a walk for two, though, or one walk and a carry?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 07-Aug-20 12:15 AM
"Oh don't worry, I have plenty of time to tease you. But for now, I'm feeling lazy, and that extends to walking." Thankfully his limbs are fully functioning- he'd do well to visit the on-ship doctor soon to examine his ribs because damn, but everything else was in working order. He climbs up the Goliath, and curls up in the safe, muscular arms of the man who just beat the shit out of him in a friendly match, and purrs softly. "Off to the #gardens , then..!" (edited)
(Joe) Jonny | Ferisso | Atakhi 07-Aug-20 12:20 AM
